net.threescale.api.v2

Interface HttpSender

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HttpSenderImpl

    public interface HttpSender
    Interface used to send Http Requests to the server.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ApiHttpResponse sendGetToServer(String hostUrlWithParameters)
      Send a Get message to the server
      ApiHttpResponse sendPostToServer(String hostUrl, String postData)
      Send a POST message.

    • Method Detail

      • sendPostToServer

        ApiHttpResponse sendPostToServer(String hostUrl,
                               String postData)
        Send a POST message.
        Parameters:
        hostUrl - Url and parameters to send to the server.
        postData - Data to be POSTed.
        Returns:
        Transaction data returned from the server.

        Returns:
        Response from Server for successful action
